attributes.action: make an urgent public statement to tell the taxpayer how he intends to ensure that those Polish nationals who are in receipt of child benefit for children they purported to be supporting, in Poland, do not continue to receive child benefit after they have returned to Poland.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The immigration state of this country is such that we have no way of knowing who has come in and who has left.  Those Polish nationals who came in and claimed child benefit will NOT be notifying the child benefit agency they have returned to Poland (they would be stupid to do so) so how will the government ensure that our taxpayer pounds are stopped being paid out when that Polish national has left the UK for good?

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
